sentences.cn: …这个城市对旅游业的传统依赖。

sentences.en: Do you look forward to old age, or do you dread frailty, loss of memory and dependence on others?
sentences.cn: 你是期望变老，还是害怕自己年迈体衰、记忆减退，而且还要依赖他人？

sentences.en: Doctors keep trying to break her dependence of the drug.
sentences.cn: 医生们尽力使她戒除毒瘾.

sentences.en: French doctors tend to regard drug dependence as a form of deep-rooted psychological disorder.
sentences.cn: 法国医生倾向于把毒瘾看作是一种根深蒂固的心理障碍。

sentences.en: He lived in a state of dependence on his friend's help.
sentences.cn: 他依靠朋友的帮助而生活.

sentences.en: He was freed from financial dependence on his parents.
sentences.cn: 他在经济上摆脱了对父母的依赖.

sentences.en: Many sufferers have been reclaimed from a dependence on alcohol.
sentences.cn: 许多嗜酒成癖的受害者已经被挽救过来.

sentences.en: Marianne's eagerness to be gone declared her dependence on finding him there.
sentences.cn: 玛丽安渴望要去,说明她有把握能在那儿找到他.

sentences.en: Melanie turned childlike eyes of gratitude and dependence upon him.
sentences.cn: "媚兰那双天真的眼睛又感激又信赖地看着他.

sentences.en: Nutrition that involves dependence upon performed organic molecules is called heterotrophic nutrition.
sentences.cn: 这种依靠现成有机分子的营养称为异养营养.

sentences.en: Repeatedly using alkohol, or certain other drugs, produces physical dependence.
sentences.cn: 不断地饮酒或某种别的麻醉剂, 会使身体对其产生依赖性.

sentences.en: The interval OC is known as the domain of dependence.
The president called foreign aid a handout that fosters dependence on wealthy nations.
sentences.cn: 总统认为外援是不劳而获之财，会助长本国对富国的依赖性。

sentences.en: We cannot forget our dependence on our fellow men.
sentences.cn: 我们不能忘记我们对其他的人的依赖.

sentences.en: We shall take a closer look at the concept of functional dependence.
sentences.cn: 我们将周密地考虑一下函数相关的概念.

words.tran_cn: 可靠的，可信赖的；可信任的
依靠的；从属的；取决于…的
依赖，依靠；取决于；相信，信赖

trans.tran_cn: 依靠，依赖(酒精或药物)，依存(关系)
trans.tran_en: when you depend on the help and support of someone or something else in order to exist or be successful
